facts.fact: The house on Willow Street has 17 windows and has been abandoned for years
The magical chest is carved with glowing blue symbols that pulse like a heartbeat
The other world has a purple sky, giant trees with silver-edged leaves, and bioluminescent moss
The cloaked figures perform rituals with drums and green fire on a stone platform
The Binding has a 30% failure rate (10% death, 20% catatonic/mad)
Magic flows through channels created by the Binding ritual
The Veil is a barrier between worlds that was raised to end an ancient war
Certain bloodlines carry 'resonance' that allows them to cross the Veil
Marcus's ancestors came from this world generations ago when the Veil was thinner
The ancient war was between beings of light and creatures of shadow
The Sanctum is deep beneath the forest in the Weaver's domain
There are hundreds of Weavers in the Sanctum, but only Elders communicate with humans
About 20 keys are currently training in the Sanctum's main hall
Keys perform missions for Weavers: reconnaissance, artifact retrieval, and Veil repairs
The Pattern is the weave of reality - threads representing lives, choices, and moments
Weavers maintain the Pattern but do not control it - they guide and prevent collapse
The Veil was designed to be temporary - 1000 years to allow healing after the war
The tangle exists in human form and requires human perception to identify
Marcus's full name is Marcus Chen
Return crystals provide emergency extraction with 30-second portals
Between-space exists as actual physical location (bridge of solidified starlight)
The Veil is visibly failing with spreading cracks and black corruption leaking through
Success means being bound to Weaver service forever (warned by Kira)
The source tangle is two people forcibly fused at hands/chest/head for 1000 years
The fusion was caused by a woman using a violet crystal to force a connection across the Veil
The original fusion created millions of secondary tangles over 1000 years
The fusion thread is hundreds of braided connections (consciousness/memory/physical/magical)
Shared consciousness protocol allows entering a tangle from within (dangerous)
Both fused people are still conscious after 1000 years of suffering
Lyara and Thomas met through the Veil and communicated for 5 years before fusion
The crystal was designed for emergency fusion magic to save dying people
Fusion happened in three stages: physical, mental, then magical
Cutting the original binding thread at its source causes the fusion to unravel
Using your own pattern as buffer can guide and slow violent separation
The Veil can self-heal once the corruption source is removed
Fusion memories remain accessible even after separation (like phantom limbs)
Voluntary touch is difficult after forced fusion for 1000 years
Return portals take you back to exact departure point (Sanctum chamber)
Marcus's channels severely damaged from using pattern as buffer during separation
Channeling too early during recovery causes permanent damage (scar tissue, reduced capacity, chronic pain, total collapse)
Some Elders wanted execution for Lyara/Thomas, others argued 1000 years suffering is enough
Challenging the pattern in front of Elders is a line that makes keys disappear
Four keys returned successfully from their missions (Dmitri, Jin, Paulo, Sarai)
Lily attempted healing as Marcus taught and got infected by underwater corruption
Lily's host didn't want to be saved and fought her actively
Lily's tangle had no healthy threads left - entire pattern was corrupted
Failure teaches limits, limits teach wisdom, wisdom prevents recklessness
Thread types have distinct sensations: life=warm, memory=cool, emotional=pulse, physical=static
Minimum intervention cuts preserve healthy connections while removing only corrupting elements
Proper training requires 6-8 months for competency, years for mastery
Second generation learners benefit from pioneer's mistakes (proper foundation prevents Lily-type incidents)
Each key has unique strengths: Lily (corruption detection), Paulo (structural assessment), Sarai (containment), Jin (pattern-space perspective), Dmitri (combat discipline)
Fighting host and corruption simultaneously is how you get infected (must get cooperation or abort)
Knowing when to abort is as important as knowing when to intervene
Early detection and rapid response prevent major tangles (what Lyara/Thomas needed)
Parallel processing is advanced technique requiring deep understanding of principles
Cascading corruption spreads through resonance connections (shared grief between family)
Skilled practitioners understand principles not just procedures (can adapt while maintaining protocol)
